mapper.select: select INSTANCE_ID, SERVER_IP, SERVICE_PORT, CONN_USER_ID, convert_from(decode(CONN_USER_PWD,'base64'),'UTF8') as CONN_USER_PWD, COLLECT_PERIOD_SEC, CONN_DB_NAME, LAST_MOD_DT from TB_INSTANCE_INFO where COLLECT_YN = 'Y' and DELETE_YN = 'N' order by LAST_MOD_DT DESC
select INSTANCE_ID, LAST_MOD_DT from TB_INSTANCE_INFO order by LAST_MOD_DT DESC limit 1
SELECT DAILY_BATCH_START_TIME, HCHK_PERIOD_SEC, TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24:MI:SS') NOW_TIME FROM TB_CONFIG
SELECT REG_DATE, TASK_CD, STATUS FROM TB_SYS_LOG WHERE REG_DATE = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TASK_CD = '2'
SELECT 1 WHERE REG_DATE = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TASK_CD = '3'

SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(STATUS) > 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END STATUS FROM ( SELECT NOW(),CASE WHEN AGE(NOW(),REG_DATE::DATE+REG_TIME::TIME) < '10 MIN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS STATUS FROM TB_RSC_COLLECT_INFO WHERE (REG_DATE, RSC_REG_SEQ) IN (SELECT REG_DATE, RSC_REG_SEQ FROM TB_CPU_STAT_MASTER WHERE COLLECT_DT = (SELECT MAX(COLLECT_DT) FROM TB_CPU_STAT_MASTER)) UNION ALL SELECT NOW(),CASE WHEN AGE(NOW(),REG_DATE::DATE+REG_TIME::TIME) < '10 MIN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS STATUS FROM TB_ACTV_COLLECT_INFO WHERE (REG_DATE, ACTV_REG_SEQ) IN (SELECT REG_DATE, ACTV_REG_SEQ FROM TB_BACKEND_RSC WHERE COLLECT_DT = (SELECT MAX(COLLECT_DT) FROM TB_BACKEND_RSC)) UNION ALL SELECT NOW(),CASE WHEN AGE(NOW(),REG_DATE::DATE+REG_TIME::TIME) < '10 MIN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS STATUS FROM TB_OBJT_COLLECT_INFO WHERE (REG_DATE, OBJT_REG_SEQ) IN (SELECT REG_DATE, OBJT_REG_SEQ FROM TB_TABLE_EXT_INFO WHERE COLLECT_DT = (SELECT MAX(COLLECT_DT) FROM tb_table_ext_info)) UNION ALL SELECT NOW(),CASE WHEN AGE(NOW(),COLLECT_DT) < '10 MIN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS STATUS FROM TB_REPLICATION_INFO WHERE (REG_DATE, REPL_REG_SEQ) IN (SELECT REG_DATE, REPL_REG_SEQ FROM TB_CHECKPOINT_INFO WHERE COLLECT_DT = (SELECT MAX(COLLECT_DT) FROM TB_CHECKPOINT_INFO)) UNION ALL SELECT NOW(),CASE WHEN AGE(NOW(),MAX(COLLECT_DT)) < '10 MIN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS STATUS FROM TB_REALTIME_STATEMENTS ) AS ST
